name: flatMap(_:)
desc: Creates an asynchronous sequence that concatenates the results of calling the given error-throwing transformation with each element of this sequence.
declaration: func flatMap<SegmentOfResult>(_ transform: @escaping (Notification) async throws -> SegmentOfResult) -> AsyncThrowingFlatMapSequence<NotificationCenter.Notifications, SegmentOfResult> where SegmentOfResult : AsyncSequence
